mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, channel = #{channel}, part = #{part}, video_id = #{videoId}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt}, like_cnt = #{likeCnt}, channel_img = #{channelImg} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, channel, part, video_id, view_cnt, like_cnt , date_format(created_at, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H시%i분%s초') as created_at, channel_img FROM post WHERE id = #{id}
